description:
**Course Updated November 2015 - Over 700 students.**

This course is designed for those of you who are ready to:

  • Position your authority and influence online to get a rush of prospects, increase sales and make a passive income.
  • Find out more about Virtual Summits and how you can be leveraged to make a profit.
  • You are not sure if a Virtual Summit is going to be a good idea and want to find out more before investing more time and money.

You recognize that you want to:

  • Learn low cost and no cost ways to market your business onlin.
  • Make a bigger impact, increase the size of your buyers list and have more customers.
  • Reach a global audience without leaving your home.
  • Host a live event but don't need the hefty bill and months of planning
  • Significantly cut your marketing and advertising spend
  • Be seen as the leader and go-to-expert in your field

Hi I'm Wendy Kier,


I've been hosting Virtual Summits since 2013, I've created An Introduction to Profitable Virtual Summits to help you find out how you can run your first profitable Virtual Summit without getting stressed out or breaking the bank.

Here's Just A Taste Of What You'll Learnâ€¦

  • What is a Virtual Summit?
  • The Key Ingredient you need to make your Virtual Summit a Success
  • The top 5 reasons to host a Virtual Summit in 2015/16
  • How a Virtual Summit fits in with your digital marketing mix
  • Why and what your Virtual Summit needs to be focused on to give you the best high-value leads
  • The cheap as chips nuts and bolts which will save you thousands
  • The NO.1 Virtual Summit to host that's right for business
  • 9 Sure ways to make money from your Virtual Summit
  • How to tell if you are good to go

Find out if a Virtual Summit is going to be a good investment for you before you make a much bigger investment of time and money.

Wendy Kier

Virtual Summit Ltd

P.S. I am here online to support you, ask all the questions you need.
title: Step-by-step Introduction to Profitable Virtual Summits
